name: Be Our Fattest
description:
Be Our Fattest is a two player competitive game. Players are trying to eat the most fish food to be the fattest one within the time limit. 

Red Salmon players use W to move forward and A&D to rotate themselves.

Blue Salmon players use Up Arrow to move forward and Left and Right Arrow to rotate themselves.

Salmons will move and turn slowly when get fat. But by swimming more, they can be slim again.
